place: presso Signora Dufour, Via Frattina 52, II, Rome
author: James Joyce
text: Arrived safely: but very tired. Write to this address. Hesitate to give my impression of Rome lest my interview with the bank-manager might change it. Terrorised by the bank, while looking for it I found this on a wall ‘In this house Percy Bysshe Shelley wrote The Cenci and Prometheus Unbound’. I think you would like Rome more than I. The Tiber frightens me. Jim
